title: Partnership
creator_contributor_role: Gesellschaft Fur Bildende Filme, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Economic assistance
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Developing countries
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Developing countries - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Developing countries - Economic conditions
description: Aid to underdeveloped countries providing food and work for millions. To achieve this end in countries such as India, Pakistan and Egypt, centuries have to be bridged. The main goal is not merely to provide financial aid and material goods but to work in partnership and material goods but to work in partnership and material goods but to work in partnership to develop natural resources and train skilled workers. Examples of projects undertaken include power stations, sugar refineries, cement factories, textile mills, and Rourkela, the largest iron and steel works in Asia.
